column4: I already have ubuntu downloaded but I got rid of the torrent file and now I want to seed. anyway to do that without having to redownload?
should just be able to re-download the .torrent and begin seeding with your currently-downloaded file(s)
I have the torrent, how do I get it to recognize the file I already have?
depends on the client software you use to torrent. I'd experiment a bit, see if it's making new files when you try, and stopping it if it is.
